subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers traded for Sean Avery, the N.H.L.’s foremost pain in the neck, in early February. Almost instantly, they began clawing their way toward a playoff spot.
snippet: The Rangers traded for Sean Avery, the N.H.L.’s foremost pain in the neck, in early February. Almost instantly, they began clawing their way toward a playoff spot.
